::Prowl/Kluster/Grimmler/Killfest::

Prowl sees HellBeast's group arrive and open fire, swearing to
himself. This was definitely not good, unless..

Prowl's eyes shift to the massive and fully functional bulk of the
Element (the ship, not the gestalt), his mind considering something.
If they used the Element as the core...

"Kluster," he says into his comm, "Get as much metal on the outer
layer of the CF and then just let the shields drop. These attackers
are going to help us with the upcoming constructi-AAH!"

That was the point when IR transformed into her second beast mode,
causing Prowl to transform as well. He gets the images of the four
bots and takes off, heading for Cracken.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster recieves Prowl's transmission and his yelp of surprise,
looking over to see Prowl transforming into a monster. He sighs, going
through what Prowl had asked him to do in his mind. It made sense. A
thick layer of metal around the CF would protect it much better than a
shield, although the outer few rooms would be gone.

He opens his wrist comp and taps a few buttons, watching several
explosions happen on the outside of the CF. The outer layer begins to
melt inward, creating a very thick and hard shell around the
battleship. By the time the shields drop, the shell would be complete
and ready to take abuse.

Kluster aims his missile launcher, firing two missiles at Gremlin.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler sees the new enemies arrive, turning to fire two missiles at
Adrax.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest's yes narrow as he detects Hell Beast's signature. He turns,
running toward the NDE member. Aiming his EMP and missile launcher
carefully, he fires four EMP blasts and two missiles at Hell Beast,
the missiles homing in and following.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
> wait, nevermind, I got it.
> 
>        Marine was the first one to see her coming. Iron Raptor,
leader of the 
> Maximals. The first glimpse of her he had ever seen. Her synthetic
muscles 
> flexed as she barrled towrds them, holding something in her hand.
>        "Continue the attack, I will deal with her." The giant turtle
bot 
> said. His green armor plating reflected the sun, and a small hum
signaled his 
> dual shoulder missle launchers setteling on his broad shoulders.
>        Jade eyes watched her feverishly coming closer. It was clear
now that 
> in her hand she held some kind of blade, poised to land in his body
no doubt. 
> He couldnt let the Fem get any closer than she already was. Hand to
hand 
> combat would be out of the question. It was time to act, and
quickly.
>        Noting her leadership abilities, and the sheer fact that her
group 
> still endured while under constant attack made Marine question what
he could 
> do. His internal processor assesed the probability of her next move.
She was 
> to smart to come in, head on, even in her super mode. This was going
to have 
> to knock her off her feet.
>        Two black missles streaked out of the launchers with a trail
of grey 
> smoke tailing them. The projectiles quickly cut through the air and
met there 
> target: the right and left side of Iron Raptor. The two side
explosions 
> caused a bright rose of flame and sent debris scattering. 
>        Marine quickly scanned the destroyed area. His jade eyes
pulsed with 
> an optic blast ready to take her down agian if needed. He knew that
his move 
> wasnt a checkmate, only to knock her down. Now the hard part came
in.
